refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: sum The sum operator calculates the cumulative sum of a group of values.

refsect1.title: Inputs
refsect1.para:
The sum operator takes the following arguments:
array: A source array with one or more attributes and one or more dimensions.
attribute: Optional attribute. If no attribute is provided, the first attribute in the source array is used.
dimension_n: An optional list of dimensions to group by.

informalexample.para: This example sums the columns and rows of a 3×3 array.

step.para: Create a 1-attribute, 2-dimensional array called m3x3: --afl CREATE ARRAY m3x3 <val:double>[i=0:2,3,0,j=0:2,3,0]; --show-query=yes --show-output=no
Store values of 0–8 in m3x3: --afl store(build(m3x3,i*3+j),m3x3); --output-format=dense --chunkify=yes
Sum the values of m3x3 along dimension j. This sums the columns of m3x3: --afl sum(m3x3,val,j); --output-format=dense
Sum the values of m3x3 along dimension i. This sums the rows of m3x3: --afl sum(m3x3,val,i); --output-format=dense
